course_description: Pre-Requisites: AEPI 530D, AEPI 534D, AEPI 536D, AEPI 537D, BIOS 516D, BIOS 517D, BIOS 518D as prerequisites or special permission. The purpose of this course is to prepare the student for actual analysis of epidemiologic data from case-control or cohort studies. It demonstrates, and gives the student an opportunity to explore, the methods taught in the epidemiology methods sequence. The student will develop a hypothesis, and test it using an epidemiologic database with stratified analysis and logistic regression techniques. The student also will use conditional logistic regression. It is expected that this course will help prepare Executive MPH students for analyzing their thesis data.
prerequisites: AEPI 530D and AEPI 534D and AEPI 536D and AEPI 537D and BIOS 516D and BIOS 517D and BIOS 518D as prerequisites or special permission required to enroll.
